message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. It's a great value, and I'm confident you'll get a lot of use out of it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go down to $8500 just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8800. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to consider your latest offer. My counteroffer is $8600 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm still not willing to go down to $8600, but I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I'll offer the product to you for $8700. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement, Alice. I'm willing to consider your offer. My counteroffer is $8650 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll offer the product to you for $8750. This is my final compromise, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I'm willing to consider your last offer. My counteroffer is $8700 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll offer the product to you for $8725. This is my final compromise, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to pay $8700 for the product.
